block.line: The tiger gains a +10 bonus to Acrobatics and Athletics checks.
It is always considered to have a running start when jumping.

block.name: Standard Action
block.line: Attack Melee 1 (one creature); Charisma +3 vs. AC
Hit 2d8 + your Charisma modifier damage.

block.line: Effect The tiger jumps up to 5 squares.

block.name: Symbiosis
